title: Stories by Foreign Authors - German Authors Volume 1
description: A collection of short stories, originally written in German, but here translated into English. The stories take us to Egypt and the shadow of Vesuvius, as well as the German homeland. We look into the world of books and that of music and we delve into the depths of the human heart in love and loss. - Summary by Lynne Thompson
